title: Skyrocketing Inflation Rates
description: In 2016, Venezuela experienced an inflation rate of 254.95%, one of the highest in the world, severely impacting the cost of living and economic stability.

title: Soaring Wholesale Prices
description: The wholesale price index in Venezuela reached 4005.10 in 2016, indicating a dramatic increase in the cost of goods and services.

title: Minimal Military Spending
description: In 2023, Venezuela's military expenditure was among the lowest globally, amounting to just over 3.9 million USD.

title: High Real Effective Exchange Rate
description: In 2016, Venezuela's real effective exchange rate index was 741.70, reflecting a strong currency relative to its trading partners.

title: Weak Rule of Law
description: Venezuela ranked low in the rule of law percentile in 2023, with a score of 0.47, indicating significant challenges in governance and legal frameworks.

title: Extended Compulsory Education
description: In 2023, Venezuela mandated 17 years of compulsory education, one of the longest durations globally, emphasizing the importance of education.

title: Minimal Government Education Spending
description: In 2023, only 0.92% of government expenditure was allocated to education, highlighting a critical area for improvement.
